entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING ENDED, Mont-Tremblant

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
